InvertedPendulum

Class Pendulum

  • java.lang.Object
    • InvertedPendulum.Pendulum

  • public class Pendulum
extends java.lang.Object
    The class Pendulum is a simulation of a pendulum. This simulation considers the force which is imposed on the slide, the gravity, the centrifugal force and the feedback of the pendulum
    Author:
    Thomas Dittrich

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  Pendulum.PendulumVisualization
      The class PendulumVisualization does the asynchronous visualization of the pendulum

    • Field Detail

      • position

        private double position
        x position of the slide

      • vs

        private double vs
        x velocity of the slide

      • phi

        private double phi
        angle of the pendulum.
        0 ...... pendulum is to the right of the slide
        90 .... pendulum is above of the slide
        180 .. pendulum is to the left of the slide
        270 .. pendulum is beneath the slide

      • vp

        private double vp
        tangential velocity of the pendulum-mass

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pendulum

        public Pendulum(double timestepinsec,
                boolean enableVisualization)
        Create a pendulum
        Parameters:
        timestepinsec - time between two simulation-steps
        enableVisualization - defines if the simulation is done with or without visualization

        public double getPhi()
        returns the angle of the pendulum.
        0 ...... pendulum is to the right of the slide
        90 .... pendulum is above of the slide
        180 .. pendulum is to the left of the slide
        270 .. pendulum is beneath the slide

        public javax.swing.JPanel getVisualization()
        Returns the visualization of the pendulum (only if the visualization has been enabled in the constuctor)
        Returns:
        JPanel which does the visualization (null if the visualization has not been enabled)

      • movePendulum

        public void movePendulum(double forceX)
        does one simulation-step
        Parameters:
